```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)

```

Scatter plot for 1962 of GDP versus life expectancy

```{r make_plot}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 1962) %>% 
  filter(continent == "Europe") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, size = pop)) + 
    geom_point() 
    scale_x_log10() +
    labs(title = "World in 1962",
         x = "GDP per capita",
         y = "Life Expectancy")
  
```
